verses.verse: O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H8088>speech,<s%> and was <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2421>revive<s%> your <S%H6467>work<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H8141>years,<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> make <S%H3045>known;<s%> in <S%H7267>wrath<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>

<S%H433>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> and the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6290>Paran.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> His <S%H1935>glory<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of his <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

And his <S%H5051>brightness<s%> was as the <S%H216>light;<s%> he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%> coming out of his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> was the <S%H2253>hiding<s%> of his <S%H5797>power.<s%>

He <S%H5975>stood,<s%> and <S%H4128>measured<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> he <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> and <S%H5425>drove<s%> asunder the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and the <S%H5703>everlasting<s%> <S%H2042>mountains<s%> were <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> the <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%> did <S%H7817>bow:<s%> his <S%H1979>ways<s%> are <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3572>Cushan<s%> in <S%H205>affliction:<s%> and the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> did <S%H7264>tremble.<s%>

Was the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2734>displeased<s%> against the <S%H5104>rivers?<s%> was your <S%H639>anger<s%> against the <S%H5104>rivers?<s%> was your <S%H5678>wrath<s%> against the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that you did <S%H7392>ride<s%> on your <S%H5483>horses<s%> and your <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation?<s%>

Your <S%H7198>bow<s%> was made <S%H6181>quite<s%> <S%H5783>naked,<s%> according to the <S%H7621>oaths<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> even your <S%H562>word.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> You did <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> you, and they <S%H2342>trembled:<s%> the <S%H2230>overflowing<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> by: the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H7315>high.<s%>

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> still in their <S%H2073>habitation:<s%> at the <S%H216>light<s%> of your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> they <S%H1980>went,<s%> and at the <S%H5051>shining<s%> of your <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
You did <S%H6805>march<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> you did <S%H1758>thresh<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> in <S%H639>anger.<s%>

You <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> for the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> even for <S%H3468>salvation<s%> with your <S%H4899>anointed;<s%> you <S%H4272>wounded<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> by <S%H6168>discovering<s%> the <S%H3247>foundation<s%> to the <S%H6676>neck.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

You did <S%H5344>strike<s%> through with his <S%H4294>staves<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H6518>villages:<s%> they came out as a <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> to <S%H6327>scatter<s%> me: their <S%H5951>rejoicing<s%> was as to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H4565>secretly.<s%>
You did <S%H1869>walk<s%> through the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with your <S%H5483>horses,<s%> through the <S%H2563>heap<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

When I <S%H8085>heard,<s%> my <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H7264>trembled;<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H6750>quivered<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice:<s%> <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and I <S%H7264>trembled<s%> in myself, that I might <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble:<s%> when he <S%H5927>comes<s%> up to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he will <S%H1464>invade<s%> them with his troops.

<S%H272>Although<s%> the <S%H8384>fig<s%> tree shall not <S%H6524>blossom,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> shall <S%H2981>fruit<s%> be in the <S%H1612>vines;<s%> the <S%H4639>labor<s%> of the <S%H2132>olive<s%> shall <S%H3584>fail,<s%> and the <S%H7709>fields<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H400>meat;<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> shall be <S%H1504>cut<s%> off from the <S%H4356>fold,<s%> and there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1241>herd<s%> in the <S%H7517>stalls:<s%>
Yet I will <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H1523>joy<s%> in the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H136>God<s%> is my <S%H2428>strength,<s%> and he will <S%H7760>make<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>hinds'<s%> <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and he will make me to <S%H1869>walk<s%> on my <S%H1116>high<s%> places. To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>singer<s%> on my <S%H5058>stringed<s%> instruments.
